com.hula.lang.runtime.exception

Class HulaRuntimeException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • com.hula.lang.runtime.exception.HulaRuntimeException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class HulaRuntimeException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException
    An unchecked exception which occurs during the execution of a Hula Executable. Exceptions of this type will be handled by the HulaPlayer.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
